title: Robin Thicke - Blurred Lines / font ID
content:
I thought for sure it was Gill Sans condensed, but the 'R', 'N' doesn't really match etc.

Anyone?

[http://jordanmacauley.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Screen-Shot-2013-03-21-at-14.13.38-e1363876396419.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713074646/http:/jordanmacauley.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Screen-Shot-2013-03-21-at-14.13.38-e1363876396419.png)
author: K.P.

comments.content:
Know i'm thinking it is Futura Std Medium Condensed, but the '#' and the cuts in the "N" doesn't match.

It looks quite similar... hmmm

Anyone?
It is Futura but maybe a different version like Futura CondDemi from Image-Club-Graphics or FuturaEF Medium Cond from ElsnerFlake.
Confirming also Futura Condensed Medium. [URW version](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713074646/http:/myfonts.us/td-myymGh) looks pretty close to me, including for /#

Difference between the fonts are little, but i think i found it Futura ND Condensed Medium. Look at the # and the 'N' thank you both for the quick response!

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/neufville/futura\_nd\_condensed\_medium\_fa11/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713074646/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/neufville/futura_nd_condensed_medium_fa11/)
